version_description:
BUG FIXES: Crashes, added back the close button to videos
NIGHT MODE: Enable this feature in Settings to view the app using switch/view my app with a black background and white text.
OFFLINE READING: Bug fix where "loading error" would appear in airplane mode.
WEATHER: Get instant weather information for your location by tapping on the new geo-locator icon on the Weather module and in the Weather search screen.

• Fixed a bug that was causing video pop up ads to appear in the app.
• Performance and stability improvements.
• Questions about your subscription? Check out Subscription Support in the app's Settings.

Our new navigation design just made it a lot easier for you to find the news you want to read.
• Top Stories: Today's front page - articles, videos and galleries curated by our Editors.
• Discover: Quickly scan the day's most read stories.
• Sections: Find your go to news sections or discover something new.
• Settings: Tap to send feedback (we'd love to hear it), manage your account (subscribe, sign in) and find your favorite features - Night Mode, Offline Reading, Saved Stories, News Alerts - all in one spot.
• Performance enhancements
• Performance enhancements

Our new navigation design just made it a lot easier for you to find the news you want to read.
• Top Stories: Today's front page - articles, videos and galleries curated by our Editors.
• Most Popular: Quickly scan the day's most read stories.
• Sections: Find your go to news sections or discover something new.
• Settings: Tap to send feedback (we'd love to hear it), manage your account (subscribe, sign in) and find your favorite features - Night Mode, Offline Reading, Saved Stories, News Alerts - all in one spot.

Our new navigation design just made it a lot easier for you to find the news you want to read.
• Top Stories: Today's front page - articles, videos and galleries curated by our Editors.
• Most Popular: Quickly scan the day's most read stories.
• Sections: Find your go to news sections or discover something new.
• Settings: Tap to send feedback (we'd love to hear it), manage your account (subscribe, sign in) and find your favorite features - Night Mode, Offline Reading, Saved Stories, News Alerts - all in one spot.

• Now you can search for the news you want! Click the search icon in the top right and find the trusted content you've been looking for. The app will save your recent searches for easier access or clear them if you choose.
• We've made it easier to see the videos, galleries and media in our content. Look for our new icons on the images when viewing a list of articles.
• Our navigation is now cleaner and easier to read! Get to the news you want faster.
• We've improved our user feedback mechanism so we can better gather your feedback going forward.
• Lots of other bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Our navigation is now cleaner and easier to read! Get to the news you want faster.

• Lots of other bug fixes and performance improvements.

• We've changed how photos display in the app. Download or update the Naples Daily News app to receive the best experience, as previous versions won't support these changes.
• A plethora of performance improvements and bug fixes.

• A plethora of performance improvements and bug fixes.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements, including a fix to resolve issues where users were unable to load specific articles.
• CATCH UP! Get a quick scan of stories you missed right from the Top Stories screen.
• New icons clearly indicate when content is an article, video, or gallery.

• New in-app alerts let you know when there's a story we don't want you to miss: Look for the blue alerts bar within the app, similar to our existing Breaking News alerts (in red).
• As usual, we're always adding performance improvements and removing bugs.
